name: Pinterest : M I N I M
description: Hide the number of repins, likes and informations about the original post. Please refresh the page after installing this user style. - M I N I M
additional_info:
Update v0.05 (23/05/2017): New Pinterest interface! Screenshot and code updated.
Update v0.04 (06/04/2015): Small fixes.
Update v0.03 (16/08/2014): Subdomain support, code cleaning.
Update v0.02 (16/02/2013): RichPin informations are now hidden.

Follow me on Pinterest : http://www.pinterest.com/pixlpirate/
Website : http://www.pixelpirate.fr/
